commands.name: az hdinsight host list
commands.summary: List the hosts of the specified HDInsight cluster.
examples: az hdinsight host list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --cluster-name MyCluster

commands.name: az hdinsight host restart
commands.summary: Restart the specific hosts of the specified HDInsight cluster.
examples: az hdinsight host restart --resource-group MyResourceGroup --cluster-name MyCluster --host-names hostname1 hostname2
